lines.speaker: male_us_1
lines.text: Hi, can I get a large latte please?

lines.speaker: female_us_1
lines.text: Sure! Would you like any flavor shots with that?

lines.speaker: male_us_1
lines.text: Hmm, what flavors do you have?

lines.speaker: female_us_1
lines.text: We have vanilla, caramel, hazelnut, and mocha.

lines.speaker: male_us_1
lines.text: I will take vanilla, please. And can you make it with oat milk?

lines.speaker: female_us_1
lines.text: Absolutely! A large vanilla latte with oat milk. Anything else?

lines.speaker: male_us_1
lines.text: No, that will be all. How much is it?

lines.speaker: female_us_1
lines.text: That will be six dollars and fifty cents.

lines.speaker: male_us_1
lines.text: Here you go. Keep the change.

lines.speaker: female_us_1
lines.text: Thank you so much! Your drink will be ready in just a moment.
